alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 3:23PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 16 inches. The highest totals will be inland and across the higher terrain, with the lowest along the Lake Superior shoreline. Winds gusting as high as 35 to 45mph, and up to 50 mph north of Calumet and along the Lake Superior shores. * WHERE...Keweenaw, Northern Houghton and Southern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and result in power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions are possible at times tonight into Saturday morning especially along the Superior shorelines and north of Houghton.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
